extendedInfo.description: Free language translator that supports 50 languages and can speak. Wow! Type in funny phrases and make them heard out loud!Use it and have fun.v.1.3 - minor things fixed.Email me your interesting suggestions and ideas.

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work. It just re-enters what you just entered in the other language. Waste of time. Mytouch Slide
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What this translator only speaks english with accents??????? Help me im in mexico city these mexicans are about to steal 5 pesos from me.o,2 pennies
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It does not work. It gave the written word but did not speak it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app for translating single words. Avoid sentences. Oh, and for some reason it shows in the market on 1.5 & 2.2 but not on 2.1 . Huh?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Upd8 it w/ability 2 send translation via email/sms & ability 2 transl8 sms/email. Add dictionary feature. Autodetect is kewl but missing 2 much.

reviews.comment: Does not support Chinese language. It will display translation but does not speak it.

reviews.title: Was great
reviews.comment: WAS great. Now not so much.  On my new Droid Razr, anything I try to translate comes out \'org.jasonorg.JASON$1\'  Really?   What happened?
